text: tirccayayum ninnalute sampattilum sarirattilum ‎ninnal pariksana vidheyarakum. ninnalkkumumpe ‎vedam labhiccavaril ninnum bahudaiva visvasikalil ‎ninnum ninnal dharalam cittavakkukal ‎kelkkentivarum. appealeakke ninnal ‎ksamapalikkukayum suksmata ‎pularttukayumanenkil tirccayayum at ‎niscayadardhyamulla karyam tanne. ‎
